description: Roman Rivers brings his big, muscled body back to the NK mat and says he’s been working on his wrestling skills and is ready to totally dominate. Mike Rivers is brand new to NK and is a [REDACTED] to be reckoned with: a black belt in karate and a desire to slam Roman down hard and keep him there. Will Roman use his weight advantage to wipe the mat with Mike? Or will Mike use his agility and speed to smash Roman down and keep him there? Only one thing is certain… the winner will celebrate with a fierce victory fuck while the loser will have his hole pounded hard in humiliation.
title: Roman Rivers vs Mike Rivers
